basics.label: developer
basics.name: Glen Connolly
basics.summary: I am a dedicated developer who loves to design and build complex systems which do the work of hundreds of people in seconds. Since I first started writing code, I have always been fascinated by what is possible through software. I am also very good at finding the exciting within the most dull development projects, and I think that's what makes me a great software developer. No matter how mundane the project, I find utter enjoyment in implementing an excellent solution. I am doing what I love for a living.

highlights: Stepped into a greater deal of responsibility; mentoring junior developers, hosting weekly standups and taking ownership of entire development projects

Designed and built service delivery automations which consisted of but were not limited to; an optimized drive time calculation system for installation crews using Google maps APIs and a customer booking application which streamlined the customer installation date selection process.

Gained a great deal of exposure working with major GIS tools including PostGIS, Google Maps, Leaflet and Mapbox-GL to visualize large business datasets at optimal performance for marketing and project deployment
Played a key role in migrating the team's version control setup to Gitlab and redesigning the team's git workflow and release processes to regulate a constantly growing codebase
Refactored and optimized multiple key components of the company's major business processes, including but not limited to reducing a customer viability check from seconds to a single centisecond.
Awarded a Personal Achievement Award for my contribution throughout 2019
work.summary: Continued to work at Imagine Communications Group as a Mid Level PHP developer, with additional responsibilities

highlights: Provisioned and managed web applications primarily in PHP to meet business requirements and manage system processes.
Developed an anonymization application to comply with the Government Data Protection Regulationâ€™s Right to Erasure
Created an Analytics tool which monitors and visually displays Restful API calls by week, day and hour, and database activity across our systems.
Built full-stack web applications based on PHP, Zend Framework, JavaScript, MySQL, Apache and Restful API services
work.summary: Commenced work at Imagine Communications Group as a Junior PHP developer

highlights: Provided a high level of technical support to customers, working with them to resolve end user problems on a broad base of wireless and fixed-line technologies.
Communicated and collaborated with relevant departments and divisions within the company when resolving customer issues
work.summary: Commenced work at Imagine Communications Group as a Technical Support Agent
